title: anjalenraruLvAi
sahitya:
anjalenraruLvAi anjana vaNNA


anupallavi

  kanja malarirk-konjum shen sholAL nenjil vaigum vinju karuNai manjE panjena migha nanjEn


caraNam    nanjin arakkar vanjam tunja vanjiya shUDi anjanai manjaL mIdOr kunjaramenna UrndOi 
pajaram tanak-kanjik-kenjiDum kunjaip-pOlvEn cancala-minji ninrEn tanjamenr-anjalittEn
